message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this generous offer and we can both move on.
Alice, my turn. I believe in fairness, but waiting around is costly. This offer reflects the time pressure.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure is on you now.

This is my final offer, Bob. The value diminishes with each passing round. Accept this now, or risk getting even less later.
